topic.title: ZeroHello 3.0 Sort Your Pages in categorys....
topic.body:
You must only add your pages to favorites. In order to add your page to favorites click on the ... menu of a page. And then click on Favorite. In Favorites click on the ... menu of a page an then you can choose a category. http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DpVeXf8V2xgLtVb3tGsDNp2EWmPoJysoN . You must choose this zeronet page as your homepage. Or you delete your all.js of your ZeroHello homepage and copy the all.js of this page in your js folder of your ZeroHello homepage. In Favorites you can choose e.g To Politics and you have a category with the title Politics sites. You can also hide your pages of a category. Click on the category name e.g Politics sites and then your pages are invisible...In order to see your pages you must click on the category name again.....Or you can data/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/js/all.js replace with data/1DpVeXf8V2xgLtVb3tGsDNp2EWmPoJysoN/js/all.js 
restart the browser done

topic.title: Facebook for ZeroNet
topic.body: Hello exists a Facebook like site for zeronet ...and no i don't mean zerome....If not a site as facebook exists then i want look if have enough time to develop this...Or if a another guy have enough time for this ....please feel free and give me a link.......thx

1511643117_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body: its possible to get a connection over loca microcontroller....a loca fm radio can get a connection over 20km or 13 miles

1513127681_1K8XkWirXhKSqE3t6WfcjbUcuSTCa.body: You can open and close a category.....its very great....and no it dont make problems ......i have also changed my zerohello......You can have tons of sites in categorys and still you can make it so that you only see the category name.....So you can manage easy your pages...

> [missesrobot](#comment_22_19WW28sn46rz9h15xf6NCELPdzxZ2YhbyB): You can open and close a category.....its very great....and no it dont make problems ......i have also changed my zerohello......You can have tons of sites in categorys and still you can make it so that you only see the category name.....So you can manage easy your pages...
and then restart your browser ... done
its easy favorite the page and then on the same page you see categorys in the menu

merged the lastest pull change with my changes but not tested it .......
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroHello/pull/78/files#diff-3dff817c1cf8be841ffe710c3ee59134

> [missesrobot](#comment_39_19WW28sn46rz9h15xf6NCELPdzxZ2YhbyB): Another thing that would be great, is if you could have drop-down menus for each zite's merger zites. That way, they don't end up taking all of the space in the list!

is included click on a merged site name and drop-down  menu is closed.......with the title MERGED SITES: You can close merged sites....You must click only on the category name e.g ZEROME: MERGED ...

1513230190_1K8XkWirXhKSqE3t6WfcjbUcuSTCa.body:
> [krixano](#comment_243_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): I think the main difference right now is that on Facebook, you have walls/timelines for each user's profile and you can post to their wall/timeline (it used to be called a wall, then they changed it). You can also put posts that other people have tagged you in on your timeline. Otherwise, there isn't that much different, except I guess it also kinda prioritizes friends rather than everything being public (but you can make everything on your profile public if you want to. You can also make only a few posts public and some not, etc). And there's no following people, either you're friends (in which case both people have to agree on this) or you're not. [...]

that is that what i want

i think zerome with different changes can make to a ZeroBook...... It was a very nice extension to the original ZeroMe...ZeroMe is a twitter clone and i think a few changes to a zerome clone it is possible to make a ZeroBook
